edu.ycp.cs.dh.acegwt.client.ace

Class AceSelection

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ycp.cs.dh.acegwt.client.ace.AceSelection

  • public class AceSelection
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents GWT wrapper around an Ace Selection object
